DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this randomized, double-blinded, placebo-controlled, 3-way crossover pilot study is to determine whether eggs can favorably alter biomarkers of postprandial metabolism when included with other cooked breakfast foods typically selected by older Americans.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Eggs on Postprandial Metabolism
